Descriptions.Text: Every {1} Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Recklessness and Ravager by {2} sec.
Every {1} Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Avatar and Shield Wall by {2} sec.
Every {1} Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Warbreaker and Bladestorm by {2} sec.
Every {1} Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Colossus Smash and Bladestorm by {2} sec.
Your auto-attacks deal an additional {1} Physical damage and generate {2} Rage.
Gain Strength equal to {1}% of your Armor.
Execute increases the critical strike chance of Execute by {1}% for {2} sec, stacking up to {3} times.

Transform into a colossus for {1} sec, causing you to deal {2}% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {3} Rage.}

For {1} sec after casting Heroic Leap, you may cast the spell a second time without regard for its cooldown.

Increases the damage done by your Heroic Leap by {2}%.
Slam and Whirlwind deal {1}% more damage but now cost {2} more rage.
Slam and Whirlwind deal {1}% increased damage and {2}% increased critical strike damage.
Revenge deals {1}% increased damage but now costs {2} more rage.
Shield Charge critical strike chance and critical strike damage increased by {1}%, and Shield Charge increases your auto-attack damage and speed by {2}% for {3} sec.
Increases the attack power of all raid and party members within {1} yards by {2}% for {3} min.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by {1}% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by {2}%. 

Lasts until canceled.

You go into a trance causing you to regenerate {1}% of your health and generate {2} Rage every {3} sec for {4} sec after using Raging Blow twice in a row on a target.

Attacking a new target with Raging Blow will cancel this effect.

When your health is brought below {1}%, you take {2}% less damage for {3} sec and healing you receive is increased by {4}%.

Cannot occur more than once every {5} sec.
Overpower deals {1}% increased damage, has a {2}% chance to reset the cooldown of Mortal Strike and Cleave and reduces their Rage costs by {3}.
Go berserk, removing and granting immunity to Fear, Sap, and Incapacitate effects for {1} sec.

Go berserk, removing and granting immunity to Fear, Sap, and Incapacitate effects for {1} sec.

Also remove fear effects from group members within {2} yards.

An aggressive combat state that increases the damage of your auto- attacks by {1}% and reduces the duration of Fear, Sap and Incapacitate effects on you by {2}%.

Lasts until canceled.
Activating Avatar or Recklessness casts the other at reduced effectiveness.
Revenge deals {1}% more damage, or {2}% more damage when your successful dodges or parries have made it cost no Rage.
Restores {1}% health instantly and removes all diseases, poisons and curses affecting you.
Activating Avatar or Bladestorm casts  the other at reduced effectiveness.
Thunderclap costs {1} more Rage and deals {2}% increased damage. If you have Rend, Thunder Clap affects {3} nearby targets with Rend.
Thunderclap deals {1}% increased damage. If you have Rend, Thunder Clap affects {2} nearby targets with Rend.
Thunderclap costs {1} more Rage and deals {2}% increased damage.
Deep Wounds, Rend and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effects deal {1}% increased damage.
Bleed damage of Odyn's Fury, Thunderous Roar and Gushing Wound increased by {1}%.
Bloodthirst increases the critical strike chance of your next Bloodthirst by {1}%. Stacking up to {2} times.
Deep Wounds, Rend and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effects last {1} sec longer and have a {2}% increased critical strike chance.
{1}% of Maximum Health
Your Bleed effects have a chance to grant you {1} Rage.

Assault the target in a bloodthirsty craze, dealing {1} Physical damage and restoring {2}% of your health.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {3} Rage.}
Colossus Smash damage increased by {1}% and its effect duration is increased by {2} sec.

Protect an ally, causing {1}% of all Physical damage they take to be transfered to you. When the target takes Physical damage, your Shield Slam cooldown has a {2}% chance to be reset. Bodyguard is cancelled if the target is further than {3} yards from you. Lasts {4} sec.

Only one target can be Bodyguarded at a time.
Last Stand's cooldown is reduced by {1} sec, and it grants you the Shield Block effect for its duration.
Demoralizing Shout also generates {1} Rage, and increases damage you deal to affected targets by {2}%.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by {1} sec, and Heroic Leap now also increases your movement  speed by {2}% for {3} sec.
Using Shield Slam increases the damage of Shield Slam by {1}% for {2} sec, and it increases the block value of your shield by {3}%. Stacking up to {4} times.
{1}% of damage you deal adds to your active Ignore Pain.
Intimidating Shout can withstand {1}% more damage before breaking.
Taunts all enemies within {1} yds to attack you for {2} sec.
Shield Charge deals {1}% increased damage, grants you Shield Block, Revenge!, and generates an additional {2} Rage.

Charge to an enemy, dealing {1} Physical damage, rooting it for {2} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {3} Rage.}
Strikes all enemies in front of you for {1} Physical damage, inflicting Deep Wounds. Cleave will consume your Overpower effect to deal increased damage. Deals reduced damage beyond {2} targets.
Bloodthirst critical strikes generate {1} additional Rage, and inflict a Gushing Wound that leeches {2} health over {3} sec.
When Sweeping Strikes ends, your next Whirlwind deals {1}% increased damage for each ability used during Sweeping Strikes that damaged a second target.
Smashes the enemy's armor, dealing {1} Physical damage, and increasing damage you deal to them by {2}% for {3} sec.

Cooldown of Pummel reduced by {1} sec.

Critical Strike chance increased by {1}% and Raging Blow and Annihilator's damaging critical strikes deal {2}% increased damage.
Critical strike chance increased by {1}% and critical strike damage of Execute increased by {2}%.

Shield Slam deals an additional {1}% damage and deals {2}% increased critical strike damage.
Slam deals an additional {1}% damage and has a {2}% increased critical strike chance.

If your Ravager helps kill an enemy, it lasts {1} sec longer and deals {2}% increased damage.

This effect also applies to future Ravagers for the next {3} min.
If your Bladestorm helps kill an enemy your next Bladestorm lasts {1} sec longer.
Odyn's Fury increases your auto-attack damage and speed by {1}% for {2} sec.

Shield Wall gains {1} additional charge, and its cooldown is reduced by {2} sec.

Disarm the enemy's weapons and shield for {1} sec. Disarmed creatures deal significantly reduced damage.

You challenge the target to a duel. While challenged, all damage you and the target deal to all targets other than each other is reduced by {1}%. Lasts {2} sec.

Increases Stamina by {1}% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects on you by {2}%.
Stamina increased by {1}% and the duration of Fear, Sap and Incapacitate effects on you is reduced by {2}%.

Shield Block lasts {1} sec longer.
Increases the duration of your Enrage effect by {1} sec, and your Raging Blows extend the duration of your Enrage by {2} sec.

Reduces damage taken by {1}%, and Bloodthirst restores an additional {2}% health. Usable while stunned or incapacitated. Lasts {3} sec.

Attempts to finish off a foe, causing up to {1} Physical damage based on Rage spent. Only usable on enemies that have less than {2}% health.
